Posts.Content: May 28, 2019 04:12PM - edited May 28, 2019 04:13PM by jdavis817 I have had a MO oncologist for years for a blood disoreder, so it was easy to get in to see him and discuss this new diagnosis. He said after the surgery he wanted to see me in two to three weeks to go over next steps.
Posts.Title: When can you schedule an MO appt? before surgery? HereToHelpMyMom jdavis817
